title: Trellis
description: Trellis is an application that supports home gardeners in planning and bringing their vegetable garden to fruition. This is a prototype for a complete platform that provides knowledge, tools, and other resources to empower people that want to grow their own food. Currently, the application is in its initial stage (work in progress). Many more features to come ...
bullets: Built with Next.js, React, Django REST Framework, CSS

title: AgiliTeam
description: The AgiliTeam Project Planner was designed and developed to help teams using an Agile methodology to manage their workflow. Tasks are designed to be easily created, staged, and updated as needed. Teams using AgiliTeam can also create and assign users to tasks quickly and efficiently.
bullets: Built with React, Express, Mongoose, MongoDB

title: Tower Of Hanoi
description: Implementation of the mathematical game Tower Of Hanoi - Drag and drop interactive game
bullets: Built with Vanilla JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3
Uses a recursive function to implement 'Guided Mode' feature: Guide the player how to solve the game using minimum number of moves

title: Park-Z Explorer
description: Explor National parks by state or region. Filter parks by activity
